entry.title: $2250 // Gorgeous 2 bedrooms apartment, Full of charm in Prime Schermerhorn
entry.content:
The building is located in a beautiful tree line block, a block away from the L train.

The apartment features
All new kitchen with SS appliances including a dishwasher
2 large bedrooms (can easily fit a queen size bed)
Spacious bathroom with a deep bath to whom of you that likes taking long winter baths
High ceiling
Windows all over the apartment - Very sunny!

Central AC and heat

The building is a gut renovated building with a laundry room in the basement.
Call for more info--8O5=> 246>> 3863
Pet Policy:

No weight restrictions on Dogs. Please call for restricted breed list.
4 pets per apartment home

*Listing ID- 238670194
